name: Serrating-Claws - Raptor Pack Alpha
text:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Raptor Pack" monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster on the field; negate its effects. (Quick Effect): You can destroy this card and 1 card on the field with its effects negated. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: draw 1 card. You can only activate each effect of "Serrating-Claws - Raptor Pack Alpha" once per turn.
